greenhouse_east_upper.description: East side upper shelf grow lights
greenhouse_east_upper.cost_reasoning: Both lights serve same growing area and are rarely needed independently

seed_starting_area.cost_reasoning: Small seedlings need consistent light, both lights work together

relay_sharing_benefits: Reduced hardware cost - fewer relay boards needed
Simplified wiring for lights in same area
Lower GPIO pin usage on Raspberry Pi
Suitable for lights that are always used together
when_to_use_shared_relays: Backup/redundant lights that supplement each other
limitations: All lights in group turn on/off together
No individual control within the group
Total power consumption must be within relay rating
Consider fuse/breaker protection for higher power groups

description: Configuration for shared relay control of multiple lights
